meanings.definition: The small triangular bone at the base of the spinal column in humans, consisting of several fused rudimentary vertebrae.
meanings.sent1: The coccyges provides support at the end of the spine.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often examine the coccyges for any signs of injury.
meanings.sent3: During the funny dance, he accidentally sat on his coccyges and wiggled comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the coccyges, holding her upright through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The coccyges, like a tiny anchor, keeps the spine steady and balanced.
